price: (Mwenyezi Mungu) aseme: Msigombane mbele yangu. Nilikuleteeni mbele onyo langu.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu atawaambia makafiri na wenzi wao: Msigombane mbele yangu hapa pahala pa hisabu na malipo. Na Mimi nilikuleteeni mbele duniani onyo juu ya kukufuru kwenu kuukataa Ujumbe wangu niliyo utuma kwenu. Nanyi hamkuamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿīdi
